boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Naval Miniatures: War at Sea
boardgame.description: The Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies Naval Miniatures game. The base set includes 64 authentically detailed miniatures._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Hasbro Web site describes the game as _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Fast-paced and action-packed, this exciting, new miniatures game will let players recreate historical battles or go head-to-head in competitive warfare that rages across massive 30x40 battle maps._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Features include:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 64 authentically detailed miniatures in the base set, including carriers, battleships, destroyers, cruisers, submarines, aircraft and other vessels from WWII . _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Unique ships such as the BB Bismarck, IJN Yamato, and the USS Enterprise feature their distinctive markings and camouflage. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Abilities and statistics of units are based on their historical performances in battle. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Pre-painted, durable plastic -- fully assembled and ready to play right out of the box. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Larger (Rare) ships have moving parts (turrets/main guns) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Double-sided battle maps allow the creation of massive 30x40 battlefields that can be customized with the double-sided island cards _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Wizards of the Coast - Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies War at Sea 2010 - Starter Set Language: English Players: 2 Weight: 0.320 kg New -- mint condition -- unopened -- still in shrink wrap. Theme: A redesigned and updated 2 Player Starter is ready to launch for the War at Sea naval miniatures game. Each 2 Player Starter will contain 8 pre painted, authentically detailed miniatures, an updated and expanded rule book, 2 full size battle maps and dice. Each ship and aircraft included in this set are unique to this set, and carry new statistics and paint schemes not available in other War at Sea sets. The expanded War at Sea rule book will include new rules for night fighting, weather effects and long distance battles that will interest any existing War at Sea player. The War at Sea: 2 Player Starter will quickly teach 2 players how to build and operate fleets which they can use to recreate the legendary naval battles of WWII. War at Sea details: 8 prepainted, historically accurate and authentically detailed WWII naval miniatures. Updated _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; expanded rule book offers exciting new content to existing players. Allied models included: American TBF Avenger, destroyer USS Taylor, light cruiser USS Montpilier and the Australian destroyer HMAS Nizam. Axis models included:Japanese _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Betty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Torpedo Bomber, submarineI-29,destroyer Terutsuki and heavy cruiser Haguro. The units included, their paint schemes _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; stat cards are exclusive to this set. Accuracy and detail of miniatures attracts collectors and WWII enthusiasts. Prepainted, durable plastic,assembled and ready to play, right out of the box. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

original base game plus 2 or 3 boosters

Never been played - all units are still in their baggies or/plastic holders 8 miniatures from the base game and 5 from Flank Speed Terutsuki Haguro I-25 USS Montpelier (CL 57) TBF-1 Avenger USS Taylor (DD 468) HMAS Nizam G4MI _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Betty_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; HMNZS Leander HMS Saumarez Kirov Martlet Mk II HMCS Sackville Will come with maps, rule sets, markers and dice Can provide picture if desired
War At Sea two-player Starter Set 2010 WOC edition.

Starter set plus boosters - unpunched, still in bags/containers but box top ripped open. Includes: Ships: USS Enterprise (Rare) HMS Rodney (Rare) USS Washington (Rare) USS Boise (Uncommon) Koln (Uncommon) USS Fletcher (Common) HMS Javelin (Common) Lucia Targio (Common) Unlabeled destroyer Subs: Ambra (Common) I-19 (Common) Planes: SDB Dauntlass (Common) x2 A6M2 Zeke (Common) JU-87B Stuka (Common) Kondor (Uncommon) Betty (Uncommon) Wildcat (Common) A real bargain!!!!! Troll and Toad is asking $39 for the Enterprise alone and well over $80 for the individual items included.

I sell lot of the naval game of Axies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: War at Sea. The lot consists of a starter set + 3 booster pack + 2 ships including stat cards (Bismarck + Admiral Graf Spee). The game was used, so the boxes were opened and then closed again. Nothing is missing and the checkers are still to be removed from the punches. Vendo lotto del gioco navale di Axies _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies: War at Sea. Il lotto è composto da uno starter set + 3 booster pack + 2 navi sfuse comprensive di stat card (Bismarck + Admiral Graf Spee). Il gioco è stato usato, pertanto le scatole sono state aperte e quindi richiuse. Non manca niente e le pedine danno sono ancora da togliere dalle fustelle.
